thread.section_title: River Chateau Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Pretty Good
thread.title_full: Pretty Good - Review of River Chateau Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: TrueBlueRay
title: Pretty Good
text: Had a long weekend, took in the International rugby, walking distance to the Olympic Stadium. It's a nice area with some great eateries. The hotel is quite plush and well known for taxi drivers to find. We were offered a 'suite' on arrival for a further Â£35 a night. I'm unconvinced it was better than the classic double we originally booked looking at the photos. Notwithstanding the room and balcony was fine, but I just felt we'd been a bit taken advantage of,could be wrong. The staff were very efficient, helpful, friendly, the quality of fitments, huge bed, toiletries were good, excellent towels and sufficient/ generous in number. We had breakfast delivered to the room for an additional 8 euros, well worth it, it was very appetising, and eaten on the balcony. Really impressed bar my issue re the paid for upgrade.
